pages.text: The $(5)Rotation Module$() can be placed in the field slots of the $(l:mffs:machines/projector)Force Field Projector$() to rotate the projected field. You can move the force field around the x, y or z axis by placing $(5)Rotation Module$()s in the respective slot for that axis. $(li)EAST, WEST - Adjust the Yaw$(li)UP, DOWN - Adjust the Pitch$(li)SOUTH, NORTH - Adjust the Roll$()
